long_description: The Leki Wanderfreund SpeedLock Walking Staff incorporates a strong and simple external locking system that makes adjustments easy and reliably locks the staff length in place. External SpeedLock features a lever that is easy to open and close, even while wearing gloves; SpeedLock system provides a viselike grip to lock pole sections in place. Strong, 3-section aluminum straight shaft is heat-treated for outstanding tensile strength; staff collapses from 47.25 to 24.4 in. for easy packing. Rubber grip offers multiple hand positions, letting you use the Wanderfreund as a cane or a staff. The Leki Wanderfreund SpeedLock Walking Staff features a durable rubber walking tip; remove the tip to expose a carbide tip for additional bite on tricky terrain.
short_description: The Leki Wanderfreund SpeedLock Walking Staff incorporates a strong and simple external locking system that makes adjustments easy and reliably locks the staff length in place.
